Services.name: Q-Lasik
Services.text: Q-Lasik is a State of art technology for those who want permanent removal of spectacles/contact lenses.

Services.name: Cornea
Services.text: Cornea is the clear front surface of the eye. It lies directly in front of the iris and pupil, and it allows light to enter the eye.

Services.name: Diabetic Retinopathy
Services.text: Diabetic retinopathy is a complication of diabetes and causes damage to the retina (Microangiopathy).

Services.name: Retinal Detachment
Services.text: It is an emergency condition in which Retina gets separated/pulled away from its normal position.

Services.name: Squint
Services.text: Squint is a condition where the eyes point in different directions. One eye may turn inwards, outwards, upwards or downwards while the other eye may look differently.

Services.name: Cataract
Services.text: A cataract is clouding or opacity of the lens inside the eye. It causes gradual blurring of vision and finally blindness.
